songs.title: Response To Kendrick Lamar
songs.lyrics:
People keep asking me how I feel about Kendricks verse on Big Seans jams. It was dope!

— Scott Mescudi (@ducidni) August 15, 2013

Ur suppose to want to bite the heads of ur opponents. Hip Hop ain't about hugs and high fives.

— Scott Mescudi (@ducidni) August 15, 2013

I personally don't think anyone should have responded. Niggas need to put that energy into makin a classic album and responding that way.

— Scott Mescudi (@ducidni) August 15, 2013

Id feel this way had he mentioned me or not. Cuz at the end of the day Kendrick showed love, was polite and really genuine when we worked

— Scott Mescudi (@ducidni) August 15, 2013
And thats what matters.

— Scott Mescudi (@ducidni) August 15, 2013

Every rapper should want to murder other rappers. Its a joke otherwise

— Scott Mescudi (@ducidni) August 15, 2013

Im just happy i lost the "MOST EMO RAPPER AWARD" recently ha

— Scott Mescudi (@ducidni) August 15, 2013
To everyone who felt some type of way by Kendricks verse ha

— Scott Mescudi (@ducidni) August 15, 2013
Its rap. niggas ain't saving lives or feeding the hungry. who caresses

— Scott Mescudi (@ducidni) August 15, 2013
Ok so those are my thoughts

— Scott Mescudi (@ducidni) August 15, 2013
